article.title: Progeny Awarded Information Assurance Contract
article.text: Progeny Systems Corp., Manassas, Virginia, is being awarded a $7,736,483 modification to previously awarded contract N00024-14-C-6294 to exercise an option for engineering and technical services for information assurance (IA) solutions. Progeny Systems Corp. shall continue formulation of IA solutions and integrate them into commercial-off-the-shelf-based combat and network systems. The effort of this contract involves custom application of the generic IA tool-set to satisfy combat system configuration specific requirements. Progeny will acquire technical refresh kits to provide upgrade and/or modernization of existing and emergent IA improvements for the in-service IA systems, and delivery of specific products to support technology improvements and enhanced capabilities for integration into IA units and submarine warfare federated tactical subsystems. Work will be performed in Manassas, Virginia, and is expected to be complete by January 2017. Fiscal 2016 research, development, test and evaluation (Navy) funding in the amount of $877,991 will be obligated at time of award and will not expire this fiscal year. The Naval Sea System Command, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
